attributes.action: incourage airline companies and other huge profit organizations to set up low cost international boat travel companys as a less polutent alternative to air travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
there are hundreds and thounsands of jet planes leaving our airports every day causing a huge amount of co2 emitions
there seems to be no cheaper and real alternative for people wanting to cross the atlantic to the american continent or further continents,i think there should be a simple A-B way of getting accross these vast distances by boat, as a no thrills cheaper alternative for the millions of backpackers leaving the uk every year, and for the green conciouse in general. in an "easyboat" type of concept.
